description: Try our easy to follow Fast Bolognese Arancini With Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bolognese,Microwave,High fibre,High protein,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Sesame free,Apr 2020,Peanut free
name: Fast Bolognese Arancini With Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place arancini in a baking dish. Bake for 8 minutes or until golden.
Meanwhile, remove lid from bolognese sauce jar. Microwave sauce, in jar, on high for 3 minutes, stirring halfway, or until heated.
Spoon sauce into dish with arancini. Evenly scatter over cheese, then bake for 8 minutes or until cheese has melted and is bubbling.
Toss salad in dressing, parmesan, bacon and croutons from kit. Spoon arancini onto plates and serve with salad.
